trans-unit.source: GeneratorPosition is used to describe the position of an item that is managed by <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"></xref>.
GeneratorPosition is used by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IItemContainerGenerator.StartAt%2A>.
Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition"></xref> with the specified index and offset.
An <xref:System.Int32> index that is relative to the generated (realized) items.
-1 is a special value that refers to a fictitious item at the beginning or the end of the items list.
An <xref:System.Int32> offset that is relative to the ungenerated (unrealized) items near the indexed item.
An offset of 0 refers to the indexed element itself, an offset 1 refers to the next ungenerated (unrealized) item, and an offset of -1 refers to the previous item.
Compares the specified instance and the current instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition"></xref> for value equality.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition"></xref> instance to compare.
if o and this instance of have the same values.
Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition"></xref>.
The hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref:System.Int32> index that is relative to the generated (realized) items.
**-1** is a special value that refers to a fictitious item at the beginning or the end of the items list.
An <xref:System.Int32> index that is relative to the generated (realized) items.
Gets or sets the <xref:System.Int32> offset that is relative to the ungenerated (unrealized) items near the indexed item.
An offset of **0** refers to the indexed element itself, an offset **1** refers to the next ungenerated (unrealized) item, and an offset of **-1** refers to the previous item.
An <xref:System.Int32> offset that is relative to the ungenerated (unrealized) items near the indexed item.
Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition"></xref> objects for value equality.
The first instance to compare.
The second instance to compare.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition"></xref> objects for value inequality.
The first instance to compare.
The second instance to compare.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the values are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a string representation of this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition"></xref>.
A string representation of this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition"></xref>
